name: Embers Of Apricity
description:
The town of Apricity is in dire need of help… tomorrow marks the turn of the season and Lumi, the winter spirit, is nowhere to be found. Please light every gas lamp in the land to help guide Lumi home.

Created for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022!

Note: The enemy pathfinding is accidentally restricted to only a portion of the map! we will patch this shortly. Also, we are working on a boss battle.

CONTROLS:

move: arrow keys or AWSD

fight/light lanterns: space

pause: escape

Note on UI: The fuel tank represents health. The circle is a clock. The number represents how many lanterns are left to be lit.
